text: Hardcore Gamer is an video gaming magazine that based / published in United States. The magazine began in June 23, 2005, and founded by Tim Linquist. The final issue released on November 4, 2010, and became a online newspaper on the Hardcore Gamer magazine. ==Other websites== *Hardcore Gamer Official website Category:2005 establishments in Canada Category:Magazines of Canada
title: Hardcore Gamer
